changelog.summary: Added CDC Enhanced Barrier Precautions guidance for residents with indwelling devices, wounds, or MDROs to improve precaution quick check matching.
changelog.ticket_or_reason: Content: CDC Enhanced Barrier Precautions update

changelog.summary: Added dedicated KB file for Change of Condition triage (Behavior/Refusal/Symptoms) with survey-ready sections, SBAR template, refusal documentation expectations, and packet-building guidance. Added KB_COC_GUIDE source and indexed sections for search.
changelog.ticket_or_reason: Content: Change of Condition decision-support KB doc

changelog.summary: Authority pack expansion: CMS (Appendix PP + QSO memo), eCFR, CDC (core practices/NHSN/LTC toolkits), AHRQ stewardship + change-in-condition tools, IDSA UTI guidance, expanded F-tag definitions, and expanded citation sections for stronger search + packet credibility.

Authority pack expansion: CMS policy memo + NHSN manual + AHRQ antimicrobial stewardship + IDSA UTI guidance + SHEA/APIC LTC infection guideline; expanded F-tag definitions and searchable citation sections.

Authority packs expanded: added Federal (eCFR 42 CFR 483), CMS QAPI, CDC LTCF/NHSN/Respiratory Toolkit, IHI SBAR, AHRQ LTC tools, NYSDOH rights/abuse reporting sources; expanded F-tag definitions and citation sections.
Bulk KB update: expanded snippets (200) + event catalog (77) + documentation templates + governance.
